description:
No belt loops? No problem! Adjustable and strong as a lumberjack, so you can focus on your next move without worrying about your pants slipping.

  • Repreve® recycled polyester is made from plastic bottles
  • Stretchy material is super comfy
  • Premium buckles have a low profile and allow for precise adjustment
  • Machine washable in case of spillage
name: Arcade Jessup Suspenders - Unisex
